properties.entry: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, SALE, ADDRESS, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 3, ?, ?, 2, 'Y', ? ,?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
